name: Tetrowdice
description:
What if your favorite dice and block puzzle games would merge?

The answer is Tetrowdice, a game way more tactical than the sum of its parts! So place dice blocks wisely and with foresight!

Also available on Google Play

Use UI buttons and alternatively for block control:

  • Left : A/NumPad4
  • Right: D/NumPad6
  • Rotate: W/NumPad8
  • Down: S/NumPad5/NumPad2

Notice: you can ignore the warning "WebGL builds are not supported on mobile devices" - on all tested devices it worked anyway.
